channel.title: [Rs2006-remake] Project Lmaoscape! {Are you ready?}
channel.description:
Changing from delta to shard because of stabability. New server development page new soon.
Play our combat testing here, Updating soon. [Moderator please allow this:]
95% of credit to r0cky 0wnz creater of creativescape.

item.title: [Rs2006-remake] Project Lmaoscape! {Are you ready?}
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“99rangek0, post:109, topic:429978”]Would this be a fast level up thing, or slow like runescape?
Just wondering
And also, so far I agree these small and so called “useless” updates are actually very important 2 make the game like rs 2006.
I started playing rs in 2005, and I think 2006 was the best year of rs, 2006-2007ish
You have my full support on this
Good luck man, can’t wait![/quote]
3x we’re in alpha testing now.

Read full topic

Would this be a fast level up thing, or slow like runescape?
Just wondering
And also, so far I agree these small and so called “useless” updates are actually very important 2 make the game like rs 2006.
I started playing rs in 2005, and I think 2006 was the best year of rs, 2006-2007ish
You have my full support on this
Good luck man, can’t wait!

item.title: [Rs2006-remake] Project Lmaoscape! {Are you ready?}
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:100, topic:429978”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=532660.msg3948837#msg3948837 date=1332106908]

Stop working on simple and pointless features such as ‘cabbage picking’, spawning NPCs, and adding NPC dialogues. I see no real development going on here.

Those simple and pointless features are part of RuneScape, you douchebag, you need to understand that every single thing you do is progress towards 100% replicated RS.
[/quote]

If his only goal is to spawn NPCs and replicate 06’s appearance, that’s different.[/quote]
I have Long term goals and small term goals, I am keeping it within my schedule, until the summer.

Read full topic
